text: The 2023–24 Burton Albion F.C. season is the 74th season for Burton Albion F.C.. It is their sixth season in League One since being relegated from the Championship. The club is also in League One, the FA Cup, the EFL Cup, and the 2023–24 EFL Trophy. Category:2023 in association football Category:2024 in association football
title: 2023–24 Burton Albion F.C. season
